settings.heading: Self-Care Made Social
settings.subheading: Where science-backed recovery meets community. Experience 60-minute restoration in Phuket's premier wellness sanctuary—designed to accelerate recovery, reduce inflammation, and optimize performance.

settings.heading: Accelerate Recovery in Our Tech-Remedies
settings.subheading: Privately reserved experiences designed to accelerate recovery, reduce inflammation, and optimize performance. Book for yourself or transform recovery into a social experience—bring up to 6 people.

settings.title: HBOT Chamber
settings.description: Accelerate recovery with 10x more oxygen to your cells. Our HBOT chamber reduces inflammation, speeds muscle repair, and enhances cognitive function—trusted by elite athletes and biohackers worldwide.

settings.title: Contrast Suite
settings.description: Reduce inflammation by 40% in 24 hours with our signature thermal circuit. Guided rotation of sauna and ice bath accelerates recovery, improves circulation, and enhances mental clarity.

settings.title: Sauna Suite
settings.description: Reduce muscle soreness and boost recovery in your private sauna suite. Heat therapy soothes muscles, accelerates metabolism, and activates heat shock proteins for cellular repair. Traditional sauna and steam options available.

settings.title: Guided Ice Bath
settings.description: Increase dopamine by 250% and reduce inflammation with guided breathwork and cold immersion. Join the #6minuteclub—a transformative social experience for up to 6 people.

settings.title: IV Vitamin Therapy
settings.description: Boost energy and optimize recovery with bespoke IV drips tailored to your needs. Experience 100% nutrient absorption in our social IV suites—perfect for groups up to 4.

settings.title: Red Light Therapy
settings.description: Increase collagen production by 30% and accelerate muscle recovery with targeted red light wavelengths (630-850nm). Enhance cellular energy production and reduce inflammation in just 15 minutes.

settings.heading: Build Your Recovery Routine
settings.subheading: An inclusive community with thoughtfully limited memberships. Build your recovery routine with 4-16 monthly Tech-Remedy Credits, unlimited ice baths, and member-only pricing—starting at $395/month.
settings.bottom_text: Not sure which tier is right for you? Our team can help.

settings.heading: Transform Your Event Into Recovery
settings.subheading: Private club rentals, special celebrations, and corporate wellness experiences. Make people feel better together with curated Tech-Remedies and social experiences.
settings.cta_text: Our events team will personally guide you through every detail.

settings.label: Private Club Rentals
settings.title: Your Club. Your Guest List. Our Team.
settings.description: Full takeovers, semi-private spaces, or after-hours rentals. Every event is fully staffed with curated Tech-Remedies and social experiences.

settings.label: Special Celebrations
settings.title: Celebrate in a Way That Feels Good
settings.description: Birthdays, bachelor and bachelorette parties, pre or post-wedding gatherings. Transform your celebration into a recovery experience people will remember—breathwork, ice baths, and social wellness.
settings.feature_2: Sauna socials and red light glow

settings.label: Corporate Wellness
settings.title: Performance Without the Burnout
settings.description: In a world that expects more from teams while giving them less time to recover, we offer a better way.
